sourcesContent: import{css as o}from"./stitches.config";export const sharedFocus=o({WebkitTapHighlightColor:"transparent","&:focus:not(&:focus-visible)":{boxShadow:"none"},"&:focus":{outline:"none",boxShadow:"0 0 0 2px $colors$background, 0 0 0 4px $colors$primary"},"@safari":{WebkitTapHighlightColor:"transparent",outline:"none"}});export const cssFocusVisible=o({variants:{isFocusVisible:{true:{outline:"transparent solid 2px",outlineOffset:"2px",boxShadow:"0 0 0 2px $colors$background, 0 0 0 4px $colors$primary"},false:{outline:"none"}}}});export const cssNoBlurriness=o({transform:"translateZ(0)",backfaceVisibility:"hidden"});export const sharedVisuallyHidden=o({border:"0px",clip:"rect(0px, 0px, 0px, 0px)",height:"1px",width:"1px",margin:"-1px",padding:"0px",overflow:"hidden",whiteSpace:"nowrap",position:"absolute"});export const sharedDialogPopup=o({'&[aria-haspopup="true"]&[aria-expanded="true"]':{opacity:.7,transform:"scale(0.97)"}});
